pages=160<ref name=amazon>[http://www.amazon.com/Lord-Rings-Towers-Strategy-Game/dp/1841542857/ref=pd_sim_b1 The Lord of The Rings: The Two Towers: The Lord of The Rings Strategy Game] at [http://www.amazon.com/ref=gno_logo Amazon.com] (accessed 17 September 2011)</ref>

column1: '''''The Lord of the Rings Strategy Battle Game: The Two Towers'''''  (also known as '''''The Two Towers Journeybook''''') is a supplement for [[Games Workshop]]'s ''[[The Lord of the Rings Strategy Battle Game]]''.

The journey continues! Fight out the battles and encounters of ''The Two Towers'' book and film on your own tabletop, painting the miniatures and building all the terrain you need as you go. This book is a supplement for Games Workshop's ''The Lord of The Rings Strategy Battle Game'' - you will need a copy of the rules in order to play.

*[http://boardgamegeek.com/boardgameexpansion/71097/the-lord-of-the-rings-strategy-battle-game-the-two The Lord of the Rings: Strategy Battle Game: The Two Towers Journeybook] at [http://boardgamegeek.com/ BoardGameGeek]
{{DEFAULTSORT:Lord of the Rings Strategy Battle Game: The Two Towers, The}}
